modName: Moonlight Tales SE for Skyrim - Werewolf and Werebear Overhaul
summary: Moonlight Tales Special Edition is a complete werewolf gameplay overhaul including: lunar transformations, completely new perk tree with 32 unique perks, innovative roaring system, skin system, werebears, moon howling and revert form, werewolf looting and interactions, extensive human form powers, custom animations, sound effects and more!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.spwned.net/pics/moonlight_tales/special_edition/title.png[/img][/center]

[size=5][b]Introduction[/b][/size]

Five years of werewolf modding led to this project, and before I say anything I would like to thank everyone who played the [b]Tales of Lycanthropy[/b] or [b]Moonlight Tales[/b] mod series. Without your support, I would have never made this mod. Thank you!

[i]Be The Werewolf![/i]

Moonlight Tales Special Edition is a complete werewolf gameplay overhaul including: lunar transformations, completely new perk tree with 32 unique perks, innovative roaring system, skin system, werebears, moon howling and revert form, werewolf looting and interactions, extensive human form powers, custom animations, sound effects and more!

This version is the port of the Moonlight Tales Special Edition mod to the original Skyrim. It is identical to the Skyrim SE release.
See the Special Edition page for a more complete description or if you wish to comment.

Skyrim SE Nexus (PC): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2803/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2803/[/url]
Skyrim Nexus (PC): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80983/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80983/[/url]
Bethesda.net (PC):Â [url=https://mods.bethesda.net/#en/workshop/skyrim/mod-detail/3315310]https://mods.bethesda.net/#en/workshop/skyrim/mod-detail/3315310[/url]
Bethesda.net (Xbox One): [url=https://mods.bethesda.net/#en/workshop/skyrim/mod-detail/3315336]https://mods.bethesda.net/#en/workshop/skyrim/mod-detail/3315336[/url]

[size=5][b]Credits[/b][/size]
[i]Brevi[/i] - Main author and developer. Creation of the esp & all scripts.
[i]Al99[/i] - Creative design (several perks & abilities), feedback, documentation and testing.
[i]NsJones[/i] - Creative design (perk tree shape, several perks & abilities), feedback. Creation of the Moon Howl & Moon Roar sound effects.

[b]Textures - Werewolves[/b]:
[i]NsJones[/i] - Heart of the Beast skin and eye textures.
[i]KrittaKitty[/i] - HD Werewolves skin and eye textures.
[i]Fiszi[/i] - Big Bad Wolves Skin Pack.
[i]Jeremy Hamilton[/i] / [i]artifex0[/i] - Natural werewolf skin texture.
[i]Foxcraft7[/i] - More wolf-like werewolf skins. (The normal maps are used in the mod.)
[i]Bellyache[/i] / [i]wrig675[/i] - Realistic werewolf skin textures. (Parts of the textures were used as base.)

[b]Textures - Werebears[/b]:
[i]KnErBSE73[/i] - FURTASTIC werebear textures.

[b]Scripts[/b]:
[i]ubuntufreakdragon[/i] - Contribution of various bug fixes that were carried over from Werewolf Essentials (lunar transformation optimization, script registration, race detection).

[b]Testing[/b]:
[i]Annie[/i], [i]Al99[/i]
author: Brevi
